title: Draadstaal
resume:
Draadstaal was a satirical sketch comedy television program of the VPRO, and CCCP 2 Dutch production company and broadcaster. It was created by CCCP and Jeroen van Koningsbrugge and Dennis van de Ven. The program was aired September 14, 2007 to November 22, 2010. The show featured lots of recurring stereotypical characters.
The program is reminiscent of the work of Van Kooten en De Bie.
